frameDefinitions: An Entity is presented as having been seen or experienced by a (typically generic and backgrounded)
An Entity began its existence in the context of a Origin, which can be a place,  culture, time period, text, etc.
An Agent temporarily places a Theme into a Substance, often with the intention to remove it later.
The action of an Agent or the occurrence of a Cause event returns an Entity to an earlier  state of vigor and strength.
An Entity has existed for a length of time, the Age.
The size of an Entity is assessed in terms of the Degree by which it deviates from the norm.
frameExamples: Susanna Fulton's work is <t>new</t> to me.
The Christian <t>origin</t> of this quote is from Isaiah 22.
She <t>dunked</t> her sandwich into some tomato soup.
Falling prices and wireless connectivity have <t>breathed new life</t> into the PDA market.
This building is twenty thousand years <t>old</t>.
listRoleDefinitions: A concrete thing or abstract phenomenon or fact that is assessed in terms of how well recognizable it is to a <fen>Cognizer</fen>.
The (typically non-specific and backgrounded) sentient being for whom the <fen>Entity</fen> possesses a specified level of recognizability.
The deviation of the actual level of recognizability of the <fen>Entity</fen> from the level specified by the target.
The item whose <fen>Origin</fen> is under discussion.
The place or culture where the <fen>Entity</fen> was produced.
The <fen>Agent</fen> places the <fen>Theme</fen> into a <fen>Substance</fen>.
The <fen>Theme</fen> temporarily goes partially or completely into the Substance.
The <fen>Substance</fen> is the fluid into which the <fen>Theme</fen> is placed. This may be metonymically represented by the container of the fluid.
The location in time when the dunking occurs.
The concrete or abstract thing that is brought into an earlier state in which it was more effective and powerful.
The <fen>Agent</fen> puts the <fen>Entity</fen> into a state of renewed vigor.
An event or state whose occurrence brings about the <fen>Entity</fen>'s return to a vigorous state.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Agent</fen> causes the renewal of the <fen>Entity</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the Agent brings about the change in the <fen>Entity</fen>'s state.
The <fen>Entity</fen> for which a particular age is under consideration.
The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is a function of the amount of time that the <fen>Entity</fen> has existed.
A quantity or other characterization of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s age.
A modifier expressing  the deviation of the <fen>Age</fen> from the norm.
The Frame Element <fen>Expressor</fen> marks expressions that indicate a body part, gesture or other expression of the <fen>Entity</fen> that reflect its age.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is at a particular <fen>Age</fen>.
The thing whose size is being considered.
The feature of an (actual or possible) <fen>Entity</fen> that is measured. In literal examples, it essentially must be size, or a word equivalent to size such as bulk.
listRoleExamples: He gave <fex>an address</fex> quite familiar to the chauffeur.
The information used to illustrate the concept is familiar <fex>to the reader</fex>.
He gave an address <fex>quite</fex> familiar to the chauffeur.
<fex>She</fex> dunked her sandwich into some tomato soup.
She dunked <fex>her sandwich</fex> into some tomato soup.
She dunked her sandwich <fex>into some tomato soup</fex>.
The reinvigoration <fex>of the tourism</fex> economy is recognised by many as an ambitious but necessary objective.
<fex>We</fex> revitalized the Golden Mountaineer Card, and we gave seniors a prescription drug benefit.
Rock has been rejuvenated creatively and commercially <fex>by hip-hop-inspired rock acts</fex>.

New York's distinction as America's tax cut leader has revitalized the economy
<fex>in every corner of the state</fex>.
'Who's there?' she barked. 'Ensign Kim, ma'me,' the youngish voice of Voyager's young Harry Kim came over the comm line. '
The particles were smaller <fex>in size</fex> than expected .

sourceCandidateSpans.text: SEMTA HISTORY: REGIONAL DISSATISFACTION ENDS REGIONAL TRANSIT
Preserving the History of Public Transportation
the City of Detroit Department of Street Railways
